## üéØ Planning Started

### Specification
Add a resources/links section to tasks for attaching external documents:
- Notion pages
- Google Docs
- Figma files
- GitHub repos
- Any URL

### Requirements
1. Store links with metadata (title, url, type, icon)
2. Auto-detect link type from URL patterns
3. Display links in task detail view
4. Quick-add from clipboard
5. Allow reordering links

### Plan
1. Add `links` table in database
2. Create /api/tasks/[id]/links endpoint
3. Add LinksSection component to TaskForm
4. Implement link type detection
5. Add drag-drop reordering

### Tasks
- [ ] Database: Create links table
- [ ] API: CRUD endpoints for links
- [ ] UI: LinksList component
- [ ] UI: AddLinkDialog
- [ ] Feature: URL type detection
- [ ] Feature: Link preview metadata

## üéØ Planning Started

### Specification
Implement Linear-style rich text editor for task descriptions with:
- Slash commands (/) for formatting
- Markdown support
- Basic formatting (bold, italic, code)
- Lists (bullet, numbered, checklist)

### Approach
Use TipTap editor (based on ProseMirror) - the same foundation Linear uses.

### Plan
1. Install @tiptap/react and extensions
2. Create RichTextEditor component
3. Add slash command menu
4. Integrate into TaskForm description field
5. Store HTML, render markdown

### Tasks
- [ ] Install TipTap dependencies
- [ ] Create RichTextEditor component
- [ ] Add slash commands menu
- [ ] Integrate with TaskForm
- [ ] Style to match Linear theme

## üéØ Planning Started

### Specification
Link GitHub PRs to tasks and show PR status.

### Features
1. Store PR links with task
2. Show PR status (draft/open/merged/closed)
3. Auto-detect PR from branch name with task ID
4. CI status display

### Simplified Approach
Use the existing Links system - just add GitHub PR detection and status fetching.

### Plan
1. Extend link type detection for GitHub PRs
2. Add PR status fetching via GitHub API
3. Display PR status badge on link
4. Poll for status updates

### Tasks
- [ ] Detect GitHub PR URLs
- [ ] Fetch PR status via API
- [ ] Display status badge
- [ ] Add PR-specific icon
